slots.name: category
slots.label: Status Attribute
slots.description: Add a categorical column (e.g., Status, State) to group records by. Each unique value will appear in the legend with its count.

slots.name: identifier
slots.label: Record ID
slots.description: Add a unique identifier column (ID, timestamp, etc.) to count unique records. This ensures accurate counting without aggregation.

slots.name: measure
slots.label: Order (Optional)
slots.description: Add a numeric column (e.g., _ORDER) to control color assignment and center metric. 0=Green, 1=Red, 2=Yellow, etc. Lowest number shows as center %. If omitted, uses alphabetical order.

slots.name: legend
slots.label: Title (Optional)
slots.description: Add any column to use its name as the chart title. The column NAME will be displayed (not its values). If omitted, shows the Status Attribute column name.
